line_1: Your wily snares an' fechtin fierce,
line_2: But a' your doings to rehearse,

line_1: Your wily snares an' fechtin fierce,
line_2: Sin' that day MICHAEL did you pierce,

line_1: Your wily snares an' fechtin fierce,
line_2: Wad ding a' Lallan tongue, or Erse,

line_1: Envy may rail; and faction fierce
line_2: To faithful story and persuasive verse?
